## Gait speed 
### (+ `gtspd_raw.mean`)


```{r include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(xlsx)
library(patchwork)
theme_set(theme_minimal())
level_labels <- c(
        "highest wealth quintile",
        "higher wealth quintile",
        "middle wealth quintile",
        "lower wealth quintile",
        "lowest wealth quintile"
      )

plot <- function(data, xaxis, level_labels, labx, laby){
  
  data |>
  arrange(X_margin) |>
  mutate(Wealth.quintile = factor(
    Wealth.quintile,
    levels =
      level_labels
  )) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = {{xaxis}},
          )) +
      geom_line(aes(color = Wealth.quintile, 
             y = X_margin), linewidth = 0.5) +
  geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = X_ci_lb, ymax = X_ci_ub, fill = Wealth.quintile),
              alpha = 0.1) +
  scale_fill_discrete(  
      labels = c("higest", "higher", "middle", "lower", "lowest")) +
  scale_color_discrete(  
      labels = c("higest", "higher", "middle", "lower", "lowest")) +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(x = labx,
       y = laby,
       fill = "Wealth quintile",
       color = "Wealth quintile") 

}

plot90 <- function(data, xaxis, level_labels, labx, laby){
  
  data |>
  arrange(X_margin) |>
  filter(Age < 90) |> 
  mutate(Wealth.quintile = factor(
    Wealth.quintile,
    levels =
      level_labels
  )) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = {{xaxis}},
          )) +
      geom_line(aes(color = Wealth.quintile, 
             y = X_margin), linewidth = 0.5) +
  # geom_point(aes(color = Wealth.quintile,
  #                y = gtspd_raw.mean), size = 1) +
  geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = X_ci_lb, ymax = X_ci_ub, fill = Wealth.quintile),
              alpha = 0.1) +
  scale_fill_discrete(  
      labels = c("higest", "higher", "middle", "lower", "lowest")) +
  scale_color_discrete(  
      labels = c("higest", "higher", "middle", "lower", "lowest")) +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(x = labx,
       y = laby,
       fill = "Wealth quintile",
       color = "Wealth quintile") 
}

```

```{r echo=FALSE}
p1 = gaitspeedovertime |>
  arrange(X_margin) |>
  mutate(Wealth.quintile = factor(
    Wealth.quintile,
    levels =
      c(
        "highest wealth quintile",
        "higher wealth quintile",
        "middle wealth quintile",
        "lower wealth quintile",
        "lowest wealth quintile"
      )
  )) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Years)) +
    geom_line(aes(color = Wealth.quintile, 
             y = X_margin), linewidth = 0.5) +
  geom_point(aes(color = Wealth.quintile,
                 y = gtspd_raw.mean), size = 1) +
  geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = X_ci_lb, ymax = X_ci_ub, fill = Wealth.quintile),
              alpha = 0.1) +
  scale_fill_discrete(  
      labels = c("higest", "higher", "middle", "lower", "lowest")) +
  scale_color_discrete(  
      labels = c("higest", "higher", "middle", "lower", "lowest")) +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(x = "Years",
       y = "Gait Speed Over Time, m/s",
       fill = "Wealth quintile",
       color = "Wealth quintile") +
  theme(legend.position = "none")

p2 = gaitspeedwithage |>
  arrange(X_margin) |>
  mutate(Wealth.quintile = factor(
    Wealth.quintile,
    levels =
      c(
        "highest wealth quintile",
        "higher wealth quintile",
        "middle wealth quintile",
        "lower wealth quintile",
        "lowest wealth quintile"
      )
  )) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Age,
          )) +
      geom_line(aes(color = Wealth.quintile, 
             y = X_margin), linewidth = 0.5) +
  geom_point(aes(color = Wealth.quintile,
                 y = gtspd_raw.mean), size = 1) +
  geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = X_ci_lb, ymax = X_ci_ub, fill = Wealth.quintile),
              alpha = 0.1) +
  scale_fill_discrete(  
      labels = c("higest", "higher", "middle", "lower", "lowest")) +
  scale_color_discrete(  
      labels = c("higest", "higher", "middle", "lower", "lowest")) +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(x = "Age",
       y = "Gait Speed Over Time, m/s",
       fill = "Wealth quintile",
       color = "Wealth quintile") 
  
p1 + p2
```
